name: Vasco
description:
Description

Small endless exploration prototype rushly developed with Typescript + Phaser JS for the Akeneo Game Jam #2. The state of the project is more a POC regarding map generation than a playable game. Arrows to move & space bar to shoot.

Credits & Artwork

Thx @grena for the Game Jam org!

Thx Daniel Cook for the remastered Art Work of Tyrian http://www.lostgarden.com/2007/04/free-game-graphics-tyrian-ships-and.html

Thx Chmood for the inspiration for ground map generator and related tileset https://github.com/Chmood/shmup
